verses.name: Judges 15:9
verses.text: Then the Philistines went up, and pitched in Judah, and spread themselves in Lehi.

verses.name: Judges 15:10
verses.text: And the men of Judah said, Why are ye come up against us? And they answered, To bind Samson are we come up, to do to him as he hath done to us.

verses.name: Judges 15:11
verses.text: Then three thousand men of Judah went to the top of the rock Etam, and said to Samson, Knowest thou not that the Philistines are rulers over us? what is this that thou hast done unto us? And he said unto them, As they did unto me, so have I done unto them.
